description.value:
Trigger A living creature approaches within 10 feet of the skull

Effect The spirits haunting the skull activate one of the skull's ruined gemstones, casting one of the following four spells determined randomly:

  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Cast into Time], @Check[type:fortitude|dc:26|traits:divination]
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Chain Lightning], @Check[type:reflex|dc:26|traits:electricity,evocation|basic:true] (@Damage[8d12[electricity]] damage)
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Fireball] (6th), @Check[type:reflex|dc:26|traits:fire,evocation|basic:true] (@Damage[12d6[fire]] damage)
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Spellwrack], @Check[type:will|dc:26|traits:abjuration,curse,force] (@Damage[2d12[persistent,force]] or [[/r (2*2d12)[persistent,force]]] damage)

The saving throw DC for any spell is 26.

details.description: The skull of a defeated demilich is haunted by souls of the demilich's victims.
details.disable: @Check[type:arcana|dc:26], @Check[type:occultism|dc:26], @Check[type:nature|dc:26], or @Check[type:religion|dc:26] to counteract the skull's Broken Gems
